short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to hide the seen status on Instagram Stories.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
Take control of your privacy with the Instagram Story Seen Hider! This extension ensures that your seen status on Instagram stories remains hidden, allowing you to view stories without notifying the sender. Perfect for those who value their privacy and want to browse Instagram stories discreetly.

Features:

Hide Seen Status: Automatically blocks your seen status, ensuring your views remain anonymous.

Seamless Integration: Works in the background without affecting your browsing experience.
Easy to Use: Simply install the extension, and it starts working immediately. No configuration needed.

Secure and Private: Does not collect any personal data or browsing history.
